data.eml:eml: Revision of the genus Alkindus Distant (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Thyreocoridae: Corimelaeninae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Matesco, Viviana Cauduro, Grazia, Jocelia (2013): Revision of the genus Alkindus Distant (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Thyreocoridae: Corimelaeninae). Zootaxa 3750 (1): 57-70, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3750.1.4
